Key Match Events: Dallas used a late 16-0 run to rally past Portland Trail Blazers 117-111
Others: Jaden Hardy scored a season-high 25 points off the bench, P.J. Washington had 23 points and 14 rebounds
Dereck Lively II added season highs with 21 points and 16 rebounds
Anfernee Simons and Shaedon Sharpe each scored 22 points to lead the Blazers
Scoot Henderson scored 20 off the bench, hitting all 12 of his free throws
